name: @fsi-pcf/onboarding-application-assets-and-liabilities-pcf
description: Project containing your PowerApps Component Framework (PCF) control.

scripts.build: set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run build-translations && pcf-scripts build
scripts.start: set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run build-translations --isDev && pcf-scripts start watch
scripts.go: npm run build-libs && npm i && pcf-scripts start watch
